review_text: Really hard to log in with google account...i don't know why... no use installing the apps but cannot log in & read...
Free magz and newspaper in my note 8. Cool!!!

Well, it's simply a must have app for people who seek quality contents for free. Love the clean interface and easy to operate. Looking forward for additional magz, books, newspaper, and else to be added. Great job for the developer and team.
Selalu begini tiap mau login. Baik menggunakan wifi atau paket data sekalipun. Akan sangat meneyenangkan bila tim memperbaiki

review_title: Could not able to login to google+
review_text: Sungguh mengecewakan tidak dapat terkoneksi dgn google+, juga tidak dapat mendownload seperti di katakan dlm promosi yg sampai bulan desember 2014
Program yg sangat ber manfaat tapi sayang di batasi waktu gratis nya. Tolong zoom-in nya bisa di buat lebih besar supaya teks dapat terbaca dengan lebih jelas untuk pengguna smart phone.
Tried to download Kompas but fails often. No point of downloading morning paper at night, when downloading it in the morning always fail. Scoop and even Kompas app is much better than this one
Overall is good. Major thing that I'd love to have is ability to store the ebook in external storage. Three months using this apps, consume more than 4GB of my internal storage. Thanks!
